price: Haya yote ubaya wake ni wenye kuchukiza kwa Mola wako Mlezi.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا
footnotes: Yote hayo yaliyo tajwa katika mausio ni mambo mabaya yaliyo katazwa na yanayo chusha na kuchukiza kwa Mola wako Mlezi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
